name: Panic Park
description:
Team Park presents: Panic Park! 

Panic Park is a funfair manager game for Android mobile devices. Save your booth from destruction to keep your visitors in the park. If everyone leaves you lose! So, make sure your booths are fire, puke and bug free.

This game was made at beansjam 2018 in a team of six:

Tech Art: Mandy

3D Art: Leonie

2D Art: Bell

Sound: Keno

Code: Pascal + Heinki

Other contributors:

Budi (Sound & Art)

Dominik (UI)

The awesome Rocketbeans community! Thanks for all the assets and your support <3
